def.dt: :a piece of furniture that is used for storing things and usually has doors and shelves a kitchen/medicine cabinet see also file cabinet

:a group of people who give advice to the leader of a government the British cabinet a member of the President's Cabinet In British English, cabinet in this sense is sometimes used with a plural verb. The Cabinet are meeting now.
:a piece of furniture that is used for storing documents so that they can be found easily called also filing cabinet see picture at office
